text: Timro (talaka di'i'eka) striharu jo masikadharmabata nirasa bha'isakeka chin, yadi timila'i sanka cha bhane uniharuko idadta tina mahina cha, ra jasala'i ajhai masikadharma a'una thaleko chaina uniharuko pani yahi nai iddata ho ra garbhavati mahilaharuko iddata uniharuko sisuâ€“prasavasam'ma cha. Jo kohi pani allahasita dara manne cha, allaha usako sabaikama sajilo garidinecha
